values-param.name: ignored.portals
values-param.description: initial portals. the service will not deploy data to the initial portal

component-plugin.name: Initial webcontent artifact for each site
component-plugin.description: This plugin deploy some initial webcontent as site artifact to site artifact folder of portal when a portal is created

component-plugin.name: Initial taxonomy tree for each site
component-plugin.description: This plugin deploy taxonomy tree to categories folder of portal when a portal is created

object-param.name: taxonomy.configuration
object-param.description: configuration predefined taxonomies to inject in jcr

component-plugin.name: Initial acme taxonomy tree for each site
component-plugin.description: This plugin deploy taxonomy tree to categories folder of portal when a portal is created

object-param.name: taxonomy.configuration
object-param.description: configuration predefined taxonomies to inject in jcr
